name: VillanovaBasketballFacts
0:
”Alexa, open Nova Nation”
”Alexa, ask Nova Nation for a fact”
”Alexa, tell Nova Nation to give me a Villanova fact”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: nova nation
des: Get a fun Villanova Basketball fact at any time from Alexa! Open up Villanova Basketball Facts and ask Nova Nation for a fact. From 1920 to today, we have you covered with the best Cat facts. Find yourself bored on a Villanova off night? Ask for a Nova Nation Fact. Want to learn a new piece of Wildcat history? Ask Nova Nation for a Cat fact. Built by a student, for Cats of all ages!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
